attributes.action: bring in new laws so that all dog owners must have a licence and breeding is regulated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that in order to prevent dogs being abused and abandoned, owners should have to have a licence in order to own a dog.  The animals details should be on a database and the owner should have to take it reguarly to the vets and to training classes and have insurance in order to keep their licence. Breeding should be monitored and regulated and all animals should have to be chipped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
